text: varu atani (yusuph) daggaraku (marala) vacci annaru: "O sardar (ajij)! Memu ma kutumbam varu cala ibbandulaku gurayyamu. Mariyu memu cala takkuva samagri teccamu, kani maku purti samagri (dhan'yanni) dana dharma rupanlonaina sare ivvandi. Niscayanga, allah danadharmalu cese variki manci pratiphalam istadu
